Name: F5 Networks
Author: F5
Description:
The [F5 Networks](https://www.f5.com/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest F5 Network firewall logs into Microsoft Sentinel, using the Common Event Format (CEF) for Security Monitoring.

1. **F5 Networks via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting F5 Networks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **F5 Networks via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting F5 Networks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of F5 Networks via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
